para_sentences.para_0: At this point, you should be able to answer all of the following questions.
para_sentences.para_1: You should now be able to define a function, call a function, and use its return value (if any). You should also be able to write descriptive docstrings for your functions.
para_sentences.para_2: If you are unsure of any of these answers, take some time to review the course materials. Feel free to post questions in Piazza or Teams. Next week's lessons will be easier if you have invested in mastering this week's learning outcomes.
para_sentences.para_3: Check the Explorations and Task List in the Lesson 4 - Overview to review learning materials and make sure you have completed all required activities for this week.

ul_0: How do you call a function?
How do you define a function?
What are docstrings and how are they used?
What is a stack trace and why are they useful?
